text:
ce="preserve">These are the complete Grand Prix racing results for Daimler Benz AG, the official name of the works Mercedes-Benz team, including Formula One.
Notes.
After Von Brauchitsch's car retired from the race, he took over Fagioli's car.
Fagioli car had already retired. After Caracciola's car developed mechanical problems, he quit the race and Fagioli took over Caracciola's car.
After Caracciola's car retired from the race, he took over Lang's car. Lang then took over von Brauchitsch's car. Caracciola retired Lang's car and then took over Fagioli's car.
After Fagioli's car retired, he took over Lang's car.
Lang's car developed a problem and was handed over to reserve driver Walter Bäumer. Caracciola fell ill and handed his car over to Lang.
Lang got glass in his eye after his goggles were smashed by a stone. His car was taken over by reserve driver Walter Bäumer.
Caracciola was burnt by leaking exhaust and handed his car over to von Brauchitsch. Von Brauchitsch later handed it back to Caracciola after suffering the same problem.
As an engine supplier.
Jump to: 2000 2010
